data.title: FRANCE: BAPTISM, 1704. The baptism of the first
meta_keywords: france baptism 1704 baptism first born son
data.meta_description: Prints of FRANCE: BAPTISM, 1704. The baptism of the first-born son of Louis. Our beautiful Wall Art and Photo Gifts include Framed Prints, Photo Prints
data.text:
Granger Photo Prints and Wall Art

FRANCE: BAPTISM, 1704. The baptism of the first-born son of Louis, Duke of Burgundy and Marie-Adelaide of Savoy (in bed in the background). Present are King Louis XIV (seated); Louis, le Grand Dauphin at left; and the Duke of Burgundy next to the priest. Line engraving, c1704

FRANCE: BAPTISM, 1704. The baptism of the first-born son of Louis, Duke of Burgundy and Marie-Adelaide of Savoy (in bed in the background). Present are King Louis XIV (seated); Louis, le Grand Dauphin at left; and the Duke of Burgundy next to the priest. Line engraving, c1704. Granger holds millions of images spanning more than 25,000 years of world history, from before the Stone Age to the dawn of the Space Age.

Media ID 7560769

1704 Adelaide Baptism Bed Room Burgundy Ceremony Dauphin Duchess Duke Grand Louis Louis Xiv Marie Priest Royalty Savoy First Born

Framed Prints

Add a touch of historical elegance to your home or office with our Framed Print of "FRANCE: BAPTISM, 1704" from Media Storehouse. This exquisite line engraving, dating back to 1704, captures a significant moment in French history as the first-born son of Louis, Duke of Burgundy and Marie-Adelaide of Savoy is baptized. Witness the grand occasion with the presence of King Louis XIV, Louis, le Grand Dauphin, and the Duke of Burgundy himself, all gathered around the priest. A true masterpiece from The Granger Collection, this framed print is a must-have for history enthusiasts, art collectors, or anyone seeking to add a touch of timeless sophistication to their space.

Photo Prints

Step back in time with this exquisite historical print from the Media Storehouse collection. Witness the baptism of the first-born son of Louis, Duke of Burgundy and Marie-Adelaide of Savoy, as depicted in this intricately detailed line engraving from 1704. The baptismal scene features King Louis XIV in attendance, seated regally, as well as the Duke of Burgundy, the Grand Dauphin, and the priest. This fascinating glimpse into French history is brought to you by The Granger Collection from Granger Art on Demand. Add this beautiful work of art to your home or office to add a touch of historical elegance and intrigue.

Poster Prints

Step back in time with our exquisite Framed Poster Print of "FRANCE: BAPTISM, 1704" by The Granger Collection. Witness a historic moment as the first-born son of Louis, Duke of Burgundy and Marie-Adelaide of Savoy is baptized in the presence of King Louis XIV, Louis, le Grand Dauphin, and the Duke of Burgundy himself. This intricately detailed line engraving, created in 1704, offers a rare glimpse into the opulence and grandeur of the French royal court. Add this beautiful and authentic work of art to your home or office to transport you back in time and elevate your decor.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Step back in time with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from the Media Storehouse collection, featuring the historic scene of "France: Baptism, 1704." This intricately detailed puzzle, inspired by a line engraving from The Granger Collection, brings to life the grand baptism of the first-born son of Louis, Duke of Burgundy and Marie-Adelaide of Savoy. Join King Louis XIV, Louis, le Grand Dauphin, and the Duke of Burgundy as they gather around for this special occasion. With rich historical detail, this puzzle is a must-have for history enthusiasts and puzzle lovers alike. Immerse yourself in the past as you piece together this beautiful and intriguing image, making it a perfect addition to any home or office.
